items.sentence: Tom has been having trouble sleeping recently.
He listened to the music with his eyes closed.
I always eat something before going to school.
Would you just tell Tom what he did was wrong?
Would you like me to get you something to eat?
Would you like me to stay a little bit longer?
Would you like to add me to your contact list?
Would you mind telling me what the problem is?
You forgot to take the trash out this morning.
It\'s hard to be modest when you\'re the best.
